name: Heroism
text: This spell imbues a single creature with great bravery and morale in battle. The target gains a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saves, and skill checks.
mythicText:
The morale bonus increases to +4 and applies on all checks, attack rolls, saves, and weapon damage rolls. Allies adjacent to the target gain a +4 morale bonus on saves against fear effects.

Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the target can attempt one additional attack per round when taking a full attack action (as if using a haste spell). The target can use this additional attack ability a number of times equal to your tier.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 该法术使单个生物在战斗中拥有无比的勇气与高昂的士气。目标的攻击检定、豁免和技能检定获得+2士气加值。
mythicText_zh:
法术的士气加值增加至+4点，而且会应用至所有检定、攻击检定和武器伤害检定上。与目标相邻的盟友会在对抗恐惧（fear）效果的豁免检定中获得+4士气加值。

强化（3阶）：若你花费2次神话之力，目标能够在进行全力攻击（full attack）动作时每轮额外尝试一次攻击，就如同使用加速术（haste）一般。目标能够使用这个额外攻击能力的次数等同于你的阶层。
